title: ‘Industry’ Season 2 Finale Recap
description:
Wosny Lambre and Jodi Walker recap the tumultuous finale of the second season of HBO’s ‘Industry.’ They react to the shocking final scene, the arc of Harper's and Yasmin’s characters this season, and the corrosive nature of the show’s writing style.

Hosts: Wosny Lambre and Jodi Walker
Producer: Bobby Wagner
